string.text: Why not? Of course you may… for a contribution to the, say, ensurement of security in the territory. The road to the Bar is safe at the moment, and it is safe only thanks to the regular Duty patrols, as well as strict verifications of anyone passing through this checkpoint. If you are, in fact, someone who won’t be giving us any unnecessary trifle, we must prove it… Well?
Do I have to offer up money every time now…? How much?

Why every time? We’re not robbers who put a toll on mere passage. The contribution will be five thousand roubles. And don’t worry about the fact that Duty accidentally forgets your contributions. A few people will be looking at you through their sights, carefully studying and memorizing your actions. Times are heavy, the situation is tense, the authorities are evil, and people are nervous and hungry…
Thank you. I see now that you are an admirable man. Our routes will remain open to you now. You may pass!
I don’t have the money, and I wouldn’t let you grab any from me.
That is your decision. I do not have the desire to see any admirability in you either.
